title: 1657-E
statement: E. Star MSTtime limit per test6 secondsmemory limit per test512 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputIn this problem, we will considercompleteundirected graphs consisting of $$$n$$$ vertices with weighted edges. The weight of each edge is an integer from $$$1$$$ to $$$k$$$.An undirected graph is consideredbeautifulif the sum of weights of all edges incident to vertex $$$1$$$ is equal to the weight of MST in the graph. MST is the minimum spanning tree — a tree consisting of $$$n-1$$$ edges of the graph, which connects all $$$n$$$ vertices and has the minimum sum of weights among all such trees; the weight of MST is the sum of weights of all edges in it.Calculate the number ofcompletebeautifulgraphs having exactly $$$n$$$ vertices and the weights of edges from $$$1$$$ to $$$k$$$. Since the answer might be large, print it modulo $$$998244353$$$.InputThe only line contains two integers $$$n$$$ and $$$k$$$ ($$$2 \\le n \\le 250$$$; $$$1 \\le k \\le 250$$$).OutputPrint one integer — the number ofcompletebeautifulgraphs having exactly $$$n$$$ vertices and the weights of edges from $$$1$$$ to $$$k$$$. Since the answer might be large, print it modulo $$$998244353$$$.ExamplesInput3 2Output5Input4 4Output571Input6 9Output310640163Input42 13Output136246935

processed.result: You are given a number of vertices  $n$ and a maximum edge weight $k$.  You need to find the number of ways to create a complete undirected graph with $n$ vertices where the sum of the weights of the edges connected to vertex 1 is equal to the weight of the minimum spanning tree (MST) of the graph. The weight of each edge is an integer from 1 to $k$.  Since the answer can be large, print it modulo 998244353.

You are given a number of points and a range of possible connection weights.  Find the number of ways to connect all the points with lines, where the sum of the weights of the lines connected to the first point equals the minimum total weight of all possible connections.  The answer should be the number of ways to do this, calculated modulo 998244353.
